name: Gold Armor Portraits 2.1 RichStyle
description:
Gold Armor Portraits 768x768

Model trained in SD 2.1 with photos generated with Midjourney, created to generate people, animals/creatures...

You can also make objects... landscapes, etc, but maybe you need more tries.

30 steps - 7cfg

euler a,ddim, dpm++sde...etc

you can use different resolutions, you can generate interesting things.

TOKEN: jlryst, jlryst style, jlryst style of _____ ...

  • The model is created to generate armor and masks, both in humans and animals.

  • For objects and backgrounds, add weights in the words.

  • Most of the time it will generate close-up or mid-range portraits with similar poses.

  • The model will sometimes try to make superheroes , animals, etc etc... to prevent this, it is important to use the negative prompts added below.

  • Sometimes, it will not include the gold in the suit, and it will add it subtly in details.

Best positive prompts :

  • jlryst, portrait, photo, digital art, trending artstation, 4k, intricate detail, jewelry, cinematic shot

But you can also use more added ones :

  • jlryst, portrait, photo, digital art, trending artstation, 4k, intricate detail, jewelry, gold, multi color, "color" costume, cute, epic, character, led lights, intricate, shiny, multi color, diamond, cute, realistic, humanoid

Best negative prompts:

  • bad photo, bad detail, low detail, deformed, poor draw, pencil draw

But you can also use more added ones :

  • ugly, iron man, man, woman, people, captain america, iron man, dog, horns, lion, cartoon, mask, helmet, wolf, animal, messi ,walter white, super hero, led lights, unreal engine, ugly, illustration, desfigured

Improve images and increase resolution

  • Generate images and choose the one you like the most, and send it to the img2img section.

  • In img2img, choose to generate 2-4 or more images. If you want it to resemble the original photo, set "denoising" to 0.4-0.5-0.6. If you want more changes in the image, you can set "denoising" from 0.6 to 1.

  • Once those 4 images are generated, choose the one you like the most (or generate more images until you find the one you like) and send it back to img2img.

  • Now we will increase the resolution of the image. If the photo is 768x768, we can set it to 976x976 and 50 steps for example (changing "denoising" if we want it to resemble more or less) and generate 2-4 more images again and choose the one we like and send it back to img2img and keep increasing the resolution of the image little by little until you want to, in order to not lose details.

  • At this point, we can lower denoising to 0.15 if we don't want the image to change, and generate 1 image with 50/100 steps, this way we can make giant images with high resolution/quality.

Prompt examples:

jlryst style of a george clooney , intricate detailed, digital art, trending artstation, cinematic shot

Negative prompt: poor draw, pencil draw, cartoon, saturated photo

full body of puppy in a dark forest, lighting storm, jlryst style , digital art, trending artstation, 4k, intricate detail

Negative prompt: poor draw, pencil draw, cartoon, saturated photo

cinematic shot of pennywise in a forest, jlryst style, digital art, trending artstation, 4k, intricate detail, jewelry

Negative prompt: poor draw, pencil draw, cartoon, saturated photo, iron man

ENJOY !!!!

If you want to share the images, you can tag me on social media or in the comments! I'd LOVE to SEE what you can do with the model!
